pages.title: Web Applications + APIs
pages.description: SSW has the resources to develop sites of any scope, from ongoing maintenance tasks to the implementation of large complex sites.

pages.title: Mobile Apps
pages.description: We can build your mobile app using React Native, MAUI (was Xamarin), Flutter, Cordova, PWA, or Ionic!

pages.title: Angular / SPA
pages.description: Build sexy web apps with this a TypeScript-based web application platform, open-sourced and led by Google!

pages.title: React
pages.description: Easily create interactive UIs with this JavaScript library, maintained by Facebook, Instagram and a large community!

pages.title: Vue.js
pages.description: Vue.js is a progressive JavaScript framework to build web interfaces and applications.

pages.title: Blazor
pages.description: The best way to build an enterprise app blazing fast. We've seen it more than 50x faster than Angular (once it's loaded) on testing. C# with Razor pages is nicer than JavaScript.

pages.title: .NET MAUI (aka Windows Desktop Apps)
pages.description: Desktop Apps have different responsive layouts, menus, and multi–windowing, but they work on Windows too. .NET MAUI (previously WinUI and WPF) is used to create these business applications.

pages.title: Jamstack (Static Sites with Gatsby/Next.js)
pages.description: Jamstack is a modern web development architecture based on client-side JavaScript, reusable APIs and prebuilt Markup. It's used on SSW Rules and SSW People.

pages.title: Enterprise Reporting + BI
pages.description: Custom SQL reporting for unparalleled access to your company's data. Add a cube, Telerik Reports and a dashboard to drive your business forward.

pages.title: Database Development and Performance
pages.description: Whether it is good old SQL Server or the super scalable SQL Azure, our consultants know how to help you simplify your database and improve its performance.

pages.title: Power BI
pages.description: A cloud based business analytics service that allows anyone to visualize and analyze data with greater speed, efficiency and understanding.

pages.title: Bots
pages.description: Awesome bots gives you an advantage in finding and automatically entering data for your business with advanced artificial intelligence.

pages.title: Azure Cognitive Services
pages.description: Make your existing applications smarter. Add Artificial Intelligence APIs like vision, speech, language and knowledge capability to your apps.

pages.title: Azure Synapse
pages.description: A limitless analytics service that brings together enterprise data warehousing and Big Data analytics. It gives you the freedom to query data on your terms, using either serverless or dedicated resources at scale.

pages.title: Remote Work
pages.description: Put the tools in place to allow your employees to work from home including Teams, cloud migration, VPN, training, and more.

pages.title: Chinafy
pages.description: China is a booming market and now is the time to take advantage of this growing user base. Includes WeChat Mini Programs.

pages.title: Strategic Architecture
pages.description: Combine SSW's deep experience with best practices and industry trends to develop a strategic architecture for your organization.

pages.title: Software Auditing
pages.description: Receive an independent examination of your software product and processes.

pages.title: ALM + GitHub + Azure DevOps
pages.description: Azure DevOps, GitHub, Visual Studio, and VS Code provide the backbone for delivering software continuously. Manage large teams and codebases with ease.

pages.title: DevOps
pages.description: Enables your organization be more agile, bringing consistency, improving quality, and allowing you to be responsive to changes and issues.

pages.title: Scrum
pages.description: Increase software quality and eliminate miscommunication by adopting the Scrum framework.

pages.title: Kubernetes
pages.description: Kubernetes provides great benefits, such as high availability, auto-scaling, self-healing and supports automated blue-green deployments.

pages.title: Document Management
pages.description: SSW has potential solutions to improve the logistics of getting multiple document approvals, focussing on automated document workflow.

pages.title: Pay Per Click
pages.description: Businesses are now able to target their prospects based on their interests and actions on social media platforms.

pages.title: Microsoft HoloLens
pages.description: Get started with the first fully self-contained, holographic computer, which enables you to interact with high‑definition holograms.

pages.title: Machine Learning & AI
pages.description: Enable better decisions based on data. Now computers can understand and learn on their own.

pages.title: Smart Office & Smart Home
pages.description: An office or house becomes smart when its systems (lights, climate control, music, blinds etc) are integrated and perform automated tasks.

pages.title: Access Database Upsizing
pages.description: If you are experiencing connection, speed and data corruption issues with Microsoft Access, then there is a way to solve them all.

pages.title: Zendesk
pages.description: Modern customers want to be able to contact you by different media and devices seamlessly. Zendesk is the perfect solution.

pages.title: Educational
pages.description: We can create a whole raft of other solutions depending on your school’s (or university’s) existing technology and unique requirements.

pages.title: Mentoring
pages.description: Does your team of developers need to learn a new technology? SSW mentoring is the best way to get them up to speed to deliver quality software.

pages.title: Custom Training
pages.description: We believe that everyone should have access to expert advice. SSW provides high quality hands-on training for your team.

pages.title: Security
pages.description: We help you avoid high cost and high profile breaches. Include secure code auditing, network and infrastructure consulting, and identity. We specialise in Auth0, B2C, Azure AD and IdentityServer.

pages.title: Xero & MYOB
pages.description: We help organizations to remain more organized while carrying out standard accounting functions with Xero and MYOB.

pages.title: Test Practice
pages.description: SSW can help you to review your current practices and recommend better test strategies and approaches to help you improve the quality of your software.

pages.title: Microsoft Viva
pages.description: Microsoft Viva is an employee experience platform. It is designed to help people connect, focus, learn and thrive at work.

pages.title: Product Design
pages.description: We help companies to successfully launch products or services or re-create existing ones, improving UI, UX, and the corporate identity for your project.

pages.title: Web Design & UX
pages.description: A well designed user interface can improve your corporate image and sales. We deliver practical, creative and unique user experience for your website/app.

pages.title: Video Production
pages.description: Use a great video to promote your message and build more customers.

pages.title: SSW Digital
pages.description: To accelerate growth you need a digital partner who can help build your digital strategy, prioritise the implementation and execute the campaigns.

pages.title: SSW Chapel Conference Rental
pages.description: Do you have an event idea? Then we have the venue! The SSW Chapel conference rooms are spacious and quiet retreats in convenient locations.

pages.title: Microsoft Azure
pages.description: Enables you to build and run highly available applications without focusing on the infrastructure. Azure makes it easy, scalable, and cheap... for others it is difficult and expensive :)

pages.title: Power Platform
pages.description: Microsoft's Power Platform is a set of low-code applications that can be used individually to create easy to use business solutions.

pages.title: SharePoint
pages.description: The premier content management to store all documents & records. SSW helps enterprises customize and develop SharePoint often powered by the SharePoint Framework (aka SPFx) with React.

pages.title: Microsoft Dynamics 365
pages.description: Dynamics 365 combines existing Microsoft products such as Dynamics CRM, Dynamics NAV, and Dynamics AX into one seamless solution.

pages.title: Microsoft 365 (was Office 365)
pages.description: The Office you know plus extra tools will help you work better together, all based on the cloud.

pages.title: WordPress
pages.description: WordPress the most popular content management system (CMS) on the web, and is trusted by content publishers from both large and small businesses.

pages.title: Kentico
pages.description: Kentico is the only fully integrated ASP.NET CMS, E-commerce, and Online Marketing platform.

pages.title: DNN - DotNetNuke
pages.description: DNN (AKA Evoq) can be used as a web content management system (CMS) for simple web sites or as a powerful application development framework.

pages.title: Sitefinity
pages.description: Sitefinity's mix of benefits for marketers, IT managers, Developers and designers make it the ideal choice for medium sized businesses.

pages.title: Orchard
pages.description: A free, open source, community-focused project aimed at delivering applications and reusable components on the rock-solid ASP.NET MVC platform.

pages.title: Sitecore
pages.description: A mix of powerful marketing and business features, rich development support and scalability make it the ideal solution for leading websites.

pages.title: Umbraco
pages.description: With over than 200.000 installations, Umbraco is one of the most deployed Web Content Management Systems on the Microsoft stack.

pages.title: Network Architecture
pages.description: In such a fast paced moving industry, it's important to have a well designed and maintained Network Infrastructure.

pages.title: PowerShell
pages.description: Get your infrastructure automation from snail's pace to blazing fast.

pages.title: On-Premises: Hyper-V
pages.description: We recommend Microsoft Hyper-V - the fastest growing virtualization solution on the market today.

pages.title: On-Premises: Data Protection Manager
pages.description: Microsoft System Center Data Protection Manager can take the stress out of backups by allowing you to control all backups from one central console.

pages.title: BackBlaze and CloudBerry
pages.description: Backblaze has introduced a simple backup system utilizing B2 Cloud Storage which is cheap, requires little on premises infrastructure and fast to setup.

pages.title: Backup/Disaster Recovery Audit
pages.description: If you have good backups and a thorough Disaster Recovery plan, you can mitigate or completely overcome potential catastrophes.

pages.title: Microsoft Teams
pages.description: Teams is the premier Office 365 chat, collaboration and phone system from Microsoft.

pages.title: Video Conferencing
pages.description: Engage remote teams and employees to work from home; promote collaboration across the team; run webinars and live events; meet clients; interview job candidates.

pages.title: Service Desk
pages.description: Potential costs savings as you are only paying for support when you need it.

pages.title: Support Plans
pages.description: Gain peace of mind that you'll be covered in case of an emergency.
